original: naapariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā

translated: and from factors that are not causally produced, causally arisen states. (Abbreviated.)
With respect to cause, six; with respect to predominance, six; … with respect to non-hindrance, six.
